text: Class Action is a 1991 melodramatic thriller movie. The movie is about a lawsuit related to injuries caused by a defective car. Laurence Fishburne plays Nick. Gene Hackman plays Jedediah Tucker Ward. Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio plays Maggie. The movie received mostly positive review. It was a moderate box office success. Category:1991 thriller movies Category:1991 drama movies Category:1991 movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Apted
title: Class Action
